long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily check if popular websites or the current active tab are blocked or accessible with this sleek, user-friendly extension.

Full Description:
Easily monitor the accessibility of popular websites like Facebook, YouTube, Instagram, Gmail, and more, or test the current active tab's website.
This lightweight Chrome extension is perfect for troubleshooting internet restrictions, monitoring censorship, or ensuring smooth browsing.

Key Features:

Real-time status checking for popular websites.
Check if the current active tab's website is blocked or accessible.
Modern design with site-specific icons and visual indicators.
Lightweight, fast, and easy to use.
Who is this for?
Ideal for users in regions with internet restrictions, IT administrators, or anyone wanting to verify website availability quickly.

3. Permissions
List the permissions used in your extension and why they are necessary:

Permissions:

activeTab: To retrieve and check the URL of the active tab.

Why these are needed:

The activeTab and tabs permissions are essential for checking the current tab's website.
The host_permissions allow the extension to test connectivity to any website.

Privacy Policy

This extension does not collect, store, or share any user data. All website checks are performed locally on your device.
The extension does not send any information about your browsing activity to external servers.

Data Fetch Policy
Site Block Checker uses HTTP GET requests to test the accessibility of websites. These requests are direct and do not involve external servers.

No user data is collected or transmitted.
The extension does not store any information about the websites checked.
